title: New: Favela – Throne
body:
The UK is rapidly becoming a hot-bed for R&B influenced singers / producers, with the likes of SOHN, Lxury and Oceaån leading the charge.

Twenty one year old Leeds based producer **Favela** is the latest name toy add to the ever growing list, and his newest track, _Throne_, may well be his best yet. Fluttering electronics and an intelligent, honest approach to lyricism, Favela is set for an exciting 2014.
